title: Past Perfect Continuous
description: Слушайте о длительных действиях, предшествовавших другому событию в прошлом.

tasks.audioText: When the ambulance finally arrived, the neighbours were relieved. They had been waiting for over forty minutes in the freezing cold.
tasks.transcript: They had been waiting for over forty minutes in the freezing cold.

options.text: The ambulance arrived within five minutes.
They waited for more than forty minutes in very cold weather before the ambulance came.
They went inside because of the cold weather.
The ambulance never arrived at the scene.

tasks.explanation: 'Had been waiting' (past perfect continuous) shows a duration of waiting that continued up to the ambulance's arrival.

tasks.audioText: Laura looked exhausted when she came home from work on Friday. She had been working on the annual report non-stop for three days.
tasks.transcript: She had been working on the annual report non-stop for three days.

options.text: She had continuously worked on the report for three days without a break.
She finished the report in just one afternoon.
She hadn't started working on the report yet.
She delegated the report to her colleague.

tasks.explanation: 'Had been working' emphasizes the continuous nature of the activity over three days, explaining her exhaustion.

tasks.audioText: The ground was completely soaked when we woke up on Saturday morning. It had been raining heavily throughout the entire night.
tasks.transcript: It had been raining heavily throughout the entire night.

options.text: It rained briefly and then stopped before morning.
Heavy rain fell continuously all night long.
The weather was dry and sunny overnight.
It only started raining in the early morning.

tasks.explanation: 'Had been raining' shows that the rain was a continuous process throughout the night, leading to the soaked ground.

tasks.audioText: The detective finally solved the mysterious case last Tuesday. He had been investigating the crime for nearly eighteen months.
tasks.transcript: He had been investigating the crime for nearly eighteen months.

options.text: He solved the case within the first week.
He spent almost a year and a half continuously working on the investigation.
He gave up the investigation after a few months.
Another detective was assigned to the case.

tasks.explanation: 'Had been investigating' stresses the long, ongoing process of the investigation before it was finally resolved.

tasks.audioText: When the coach blew the final whistle, the players collapsed on the field. They had been running and training intensely since early morning.
tasks.transcript: They had been running and training intensely since early morning.

options.text: They arrived just before the whistle and hadn't exercised at all.
They had been exercising vigorously from the early hours until the end.
They trained for only thirty minutes before the whistle.
They were well-rested and full of energy.

tasks.explanation: 'Had been running and training' emphasizes the extended duration of physical exertion, explaining their collapse.

tasks.audioText: The couple announced their engagement at the family dinner. They had been dating secretly for two years before telling anyone.
tasks.transcript: They had been dating secretly for two years before telling anyone.

options.text: Everyone knew about their relationship from the beginning.
They kept their relationship hidden for two years prior to the announcement.
They met for the first time at the family dinner.
They dated openly and everyone approved.

tasks.explanation: 'Had been dating secretly' shows a continuous secret relationship over two years leading up to the announcement.

tasks.audioText: The doctor told James his health problems were serious. James had been ignoring the symptoms for months before seeking medical advice.
tasks.transcript: James had been ignoring the symptoms for months before seeking medical advice.

options.text: James visited the doctor as soon as symptoms appeared.
James continuously disregarded his symptoms for months before finally seeing a doctor.
James never experienced any health symptoms.
The doctor said James was in perfect health.

tasks.explanation: 'Had been ignoring' shows an ongoing neglectful behaviour over months, which preceded his eventual doctor visit.

tasks.audioText: The software launch was a huge success when it went live in March. The development team had been coding and testing for over a year.
tasks.transcript: The development team had been coding and testing for over a year.

options.text: The team built the software in just a couple of weeks.
The team spent more than twelve months continuously developing and testing the software.
The software was purchased from another company.
The launch was postponed indefinitely.

tasks.explanation: 'Had been coding and testing' emphasizes the ongoing, prolonged development work that preceded the successful launch.

tasks.audioText: Maria's eyes were red and puffy when her friend arrived at her apartment. She had been crying for hours after receiving the bad news.
tasks.transcript: She had been crying for hours after receiving the bad news.

options.text: She cried continuously for hours because of the upsetting news.
She was happy and laughing when her friend arrived.
She cried for only a minute and then felt better.
She didn't receive any news that day.

tasks.explanation: 'Had been crying' emphasizes the extended, continuous nature of crying, which explains her physical appearance.

tasks.audioText: The professor published a groundbreaking paper on climate change last autumn. She had been researching the topic for over a decade.
tasks.transcript: She had been researching the topic for over a decade.

options.text: She studied climate change for more than ten years before publishing her paper.
She started and finished her research in one semester.
She published the paper without doing any prior research.
Her research was on a completely different subject.

tasks.explanation: 'Had been researching for over a decade' shows more than ten years of continuous study before the publication.

tasks.audioText: When the taxi finally arrived, the passengers were furious. They had been standing in the rain for twenty-five minutes.
tasks.transcript: They had been standing in the rain for twenty-five minutes.

options.text: They waited indoors until the taxi came.
The taxi arrived immediately when they called.
They stood outside in the rain for nearly half an hour before the taxi appeared.
The weather was sunny and dry while they waited.

tasks.explanation: 'Had been standing in the rain' describes a continuous uncomfortable situation lasting 25 minutes before the taxi arrived.

tasks.audioText: The neighbours finally complained about the noise from our flat. We had been playing loud music and dancing since eight o'clock.
tasks.transcript: We had been playing loud music and dancing since eight o'clock.

options.text: They had been partying with loud music from eight o'clock until the complaint.
They were quiet all evening and the complaint was unfounded.
They turned off the music before the neighbours noticed.
The neighbours joined the party and enjoyed the music.

tasks.explanation: 'Had been playing and dancing since' emphasizes the continuous duration of the noisy activity from a specific starting time.

tasks.audioText: The garden looked absolutely stunning when the judges arrived for the competition. The owner had been preparing it for the event since January.
tasks.transcript: The owner had been preparing it for the event since January.

options.text: The owner started gardening the day before the competition.
The owner had been getting the garden ready over several months since January.
The garden was neglected and looked terrible.
A professional gardener did all the work overnight.

tasks.explanation: 'Had been preparing since January' indicates months of continuous effort leading up to the competition day.

tasks.audioText: The students were completely fluent by the time they graduated from the language programme. They had been studying Mandarin intensively for four years.
tasks.transcript: They had been studying Mandarin intensively for four years.

options.text: They learned Mandarin in a few weekend classes.
They continuously studied Mandarin with great effort over a four-year period.
They never achieved fluency in Mandarin.
They studied Japanese, not Mandarin.

tasks.explanation: 'Had been studying intensively for four years' shows a prolonged, dedicated learning process resulting in fluency.

tasks.audioText: When the rescue helicopter spotted the hikers, they were barely conscious. They had been walking without food or water for nearly three days.
tasks.transcript: They had been walking without food or water for nearly three days.

options.text: They had plenty of supplies during their hike.
They trekked for almost three days with no food or water before being found.
They set up camp and rested comfortably.
The rescue team found them within a few hours of their departure.

tasks.explanation: 'Had been walking without food or water' emphasizes the continuous, desperate journey lasting nearly three days before rescue.

short_description: Длительные действия перед событием в прошлом.
